title: Scaffold Gradle multi-project (common/fabric/neoforge) with Loom + Vineflower
description: Create settings.gradle includes and root build.gradle applying Loom to subprojects, Vineflower decompiler, eclipse/idea plugins. Add minimal module build files and source/resource dirs.

title: Update configuration schema to spec
description: Define config fields: bot_token, guild_id, whitelist_role_id, admin_role_id, log_channel_id, application_message; provide default config file and load helpers in common.

title: Rewrite README and docs for new multi-loader layout
description: Update README, AGENTS/AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS where needed after multi-project split: new build/run commands, Javacord, cache-first rules.

title: Migrate version control workflow from jj to git
description: Beads git hooks expect git; stop recommending jj, ensure commits synced to git branch, document policy.

title: NeoForge entrypoint and metadata wiring to common
description: Add NeoForge mods.toml/metadata and entrypoint that forwards login/join to ArgusCore; ensure build works.

title: Implement cache and PlayerData JSON persistence with .bak safety
description: Implement argus_db.json manager: rename to .bak before save, fallback load from .bak, Map<UUID, PlayerData> with fields discordId, hasAccess, isAdmin, mcName, discordName, discordNick.

title: Whitelist command name lookup & autocomplete
description: Enhance /whitelist to accept names as well as UUID, and provide autocomplete choices from cached player names/UUIDs.

title: Ignore generated run configs and playtest outputs
description: Ignore NeoGradle/Fabric run output (neoforge/runs, fabric/run), remove generated junit args files from VCS.

title: Add scenario swap tasks for Fabric run
description: Capture current run config as baseline and add Gradle tasks applyScenario* to copy scenarios into fabric/run for testing (whitelist on/off, misconfigured, linked, legacy, stranger, op-only).

title: Document caching vs live Discord checks and login/role enforcement
description: Add docs explaining cache-first behavior, live refresh on denied login, join-time role verification and kicks, fallback to vanilla whitelist when Discord/config down, and operator bypass. Update README/AGENTS/AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS and new spec references.

title: NeoForge scaffold module referencing common
description: Add :neoforge module with minimal build.gradle and placeholder entrypoint wiring to :common; no full implementation yet.

title: Whitelist-aware login fallback and op messaging
description: Align login flow with vanilla whitelist: allow ops always; if whitelist disabled allow all; if whitelist enabled and Argus/Discord down fall back to vanilla allow/deny; if whitelisted but not linked issue token kick; send ops a DM with token when unlinked.

title: Add KDoc/JavaDoc pass for public API
description: Document public/shared classes and functions in common/fabric/neoforge with KDoc/JavaDoc for maintainability.

title: Add headless integration tests for login/join flows
description: Introduce test hooks for whitelist role checking, add JUnit integration tests covering cache-first login, live refresh allow/deny, join role loss kick, and MC name change auditing.

title: Refresh docs theme and note CI/lint
description: Update docs site styling to a softer palette (per user preference) and add brief note about CI/lint (spotless, tests, smoke) to README/docs.

title: Refine audit logs and login/user messaging
description: Align audit log formatting (friendly names + IDs, no #0), ensure first-login and legacy kick logging, prefix player messages with [argus], welcome messaging, link token reuse, ephemeral Discord responses, audit channel logging for cache mutations.

title: Ensure legacy whitelist users are kicked with link token
description: Change login flow so legacy vanilla-whitelisted but unlinked players are denied (not allowed then kicked); update docs and tests to reflect immediate kick.

title: Append-only audit log with bans/warnings
description: Add event log model (append-only) capturing links, whitelist changes, warnings, bans, comments; expose /whitelist review to show history; enforce active bans in login gate.

title: Refine multi-loader shared code boundaries
description: Ensure platform glue confined to :fabric/:neoforge, move shared logic into :common, adjust entrypoints accordingly.

title: Review first-login audit after legacy kick change
description: Ensure first-login audit only fires on successful allow; legacy unlinked path now denies immediately.

title: Add GitHub Actions CI for tests and smoke
description: Add .github/workflows/ci.yml to run ./gradlew test fabricSmoke neoforgeSmoke (Java 21) on push/PR.

title: Broaden automated test coverage across modules
description: Add thorough unit/integration tests for cache, login decisions, Discord bridge hooks, and platform glue (Fabric/NeoForge), targeting high coverage.

title: Log name changes for MC and Discord
description: Detect and audit-log Minecraft name changes on login and Discord name/nick changes via events; update cache accordingly (no full history persistence yet).

title: Discord whitelist application queue and review
description: Add /whitelist apply (user), list-applications, approve, deny with paged embeds; store applications append-only with timestamps and link to history; call Mojang profile lookup async to resolve UUID.

title: Remove legacy JDA/Exposed/SQLite stack and unused domain code
description: Strip old Discord/DB/EventStore code, dependencies, and tests that assume SQL DB; leave stubs until cache/Javacord paths land.

title: Startup failsafe when Discord unconfigured
description: Ensure missing/invalid Discord config does not impact server startup; log and continue; guard entrypoints.

title: Enforce login gate before join using ServerLoginConnectionEvents
description: Move permission gate to login stage (non-blocking, cache-only) using Fabric login events; ensure join hook remains for greetings.

title: Move Discord link flow to slash commands with embeds
description: Stop prefix message commands; register /link slash command with embed/button response for token linking.

title: In-game config set commands
description: Add /argus config set <field> <value> on Fabric and NeoForge; writes argus.json and reloads config+Discord.

title: Limit Discord intents to required set
description: setAllIntents requests Message Content/Presence and triggers DISALLOWED_INTENTS (4014) when not enabled. Restrict to GUILDS + GUILD_MEMBERS for role sync/slash commands.

title: Wire Fabric module to common (ModInitializer, login events, /argus command)
description: Create fabric/build.gradle depending on :common; implement dev.butterflysky.argus.fabric.ArgusFabric hooking ServerLoginConnectionEvents/ServerPlayConnectionEvents to ArgusCore; stub /argus command.

title: Tests for whitelist workflow (apps/bans/warns)
description: Add unit tests covering ban denial, application submit/approve/deny, warn/comment events, and cache persistence.

title: Add headless tests for op bypass and bans
description: Extend scenario integration tests to cover op bypass in all states and active/expired/permanent bans returning correct login decisions.

title: Remove legacy schema and jj docs
description: Delete obsolete SCHEMA.md and VERSION_CONTROL_WITH_JJ.md since DB design and jj workflow are retired.

title: Support multiple Minecraft targets (1.21.10 + future)
description: Introduce version catalog/properties to toggle MC/loader/mappings per target; document workflow for bumping versions without dropping older support.

title: Fail open when Argus unconfigured
description: Login gate should allow join when bot/config incomplete (no botToken/guildId/etc); currently denies with application message.

title: Prune remaining pre-reboot dead code paths
description: Remove leftover legacy code and resources from pre-reboot implementation (old JDA/DB/etc.), keeping only current cache/Javacord flows and shared logic.

title: Static docs site and playtest guide
description: Add docs/ with static HTML/MD covering setup, commands, playtesting; link from README.

title: Rename spec prompt file and update references
description: Rename new_spec_prompt.md to a permanent spec filename, update agent docs and references, ensure committed.

title: Add Spotless lint/format enforcement
description: Add Spotless with ktlint to all modules; run spotlessApply and enforce via spotlessCheck (wire into CI).

title: Implement NeoForge entrypoint after NeoGradle setup
description: Restore ArgusNeoForge class and hooks once NeoGradle dev env resolves dependencies; forward login/join to ArgusCore.

title: Adopt NeoGradle (NeoForge MDK 1.21.10) with multi-version support
description: Switch neoforge module to NeoGradle plugin from NeoForgeMDKs/MDK-1.21.10-NeoGradle; set up mappings/runtime deps and keep Fabric intact.

title: Implement Javacord bot (startup, role sync, log channel, identity tracking)
description: Build Javacord client in :common: initialize with config, listen for role add/remove and name/nick changes, emit log channel messages, expose async hooks for cache updates.

title: Sync agent instructions to new Argus spec
description: Revise AGENTS.md and AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md to reflect current Kotlin/Fabric+NeoForge Argus plan, remove outdated Python/dev steps, align with new_spec_prompt.md.

title: Fix slash command option order
description: Discord rejects /whitelist command registration: Required options must precede optional. Reorder subcommand options (comment, warn, ban) so required come first.

title: Reboot Argus to master spec (multi-loader Javacord cache)
description: Implement ARGUS_MASTER_SPEC: multi-project Gradle (common/fabric/neoforge), Javacord-based cache-first auth, remove legacy DB/JDA.

title: Permission gate and login flow using cache (no Discord I/O)
description: Implement onPlayerLogin/onPlayerJoin per spec: OP bypass; linked hasAccess; legacy whitelisted get token + kick; strangers denied with application message; ensure login thread reads cache only.

title: Refresh docs and markdown to current spec
description: Sweep README/AGENTS/AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS and any other markdown to ensure they match current multi-loader Javacord spec and version pins.

title: Integrate NeoForge dev plugin and mappings (1.21.10)
description: Use neoform 1.21.10-20251010.172816 to configure NeoForge Gradle (mappings, run configs); replace placeholder compile suppression.

title: Config command tab completion
description: Add tab completion and get/set helpers for /argus config on Fabric + NeoForge; suggest field names and sample values, validate numeric IDs.

title: Discord /whitelist add/remove/status commands
description: Add Javacord slash command /whitelist with add/remove/status subcommands for admins (adminRoleId), mutating CacheStore and saving cache; log actions.

title: Discord link token flow and commands
description: Implement token generation/validation bridging: Fabric command to issue tokens, Javacord slash/command to consume tokens, update cache hasAccess flags, audit log.

title: Add tests for cache and permission gate
description: Unit tests for CacheStore (.bak fallback, save/load) and ArgusCore login decisions (OP bypass, linked, legacy, stranger).

title: Fix NeoForge build for 1.21.10 neoform inputs
description: NeoForge module compile was failing to resolve net.minecraft classes. Align neoform config with 1.21.10/21.10.64 properties, re-run neoFormRecompile, and verify ./gradlew test succeeds.

title: Allow ops + fail-open when Discord down
description: Login gate should always allow server ops and fail open if Discord not started/failed, even when config present.

title: Set up :common module with Javacord dependency and ArgusCore skeleton
description: Add common/build.gradle with Javacord, Kotlin/Java 21; create ArgusCore entry class, placeholder config types, and module directories.

title: Paginate /whitelist list-applications
description: Add paged embeds/buttons for /whitelist list-applications (next/prev, approve/deny inline).

title: Align versions to MC 1.21.1 and pin dependencies
description: Update gradle.properties to 1.21.1 mappings/loader/fabric-api, Javacord/slf4j/serialization versions; verify build and metadata (fabric.mod.json).

title: Convert docs to mdBook
description: Migrate static docs to mdBook: add book.toml, chapters, build via mdbook build; adjust CI to build book and publish under docs-book/ (not tracked output).
